statements: UPDATE StockReports SET stock_level = 100 WHERE report_id = 1;
UPDATE StockReports SET sales_performance = 0.75 WHERE report_id = 2;
UPDATE StockReports SET revenue = 50000.00 WHERE report_id = 3;
UPDATE StockReports SET stock_level = stock_level + 10 WHERE report_date = '2022-10-15';
UPDATE StockReports SET sales_performance = sales_performance * 1.1, revenue = revenue * 1.05 WHERE report_id = 1001;
UPDATE StockReports SET stock_level = stock_level - 5, sales_performance = sales_performance * 0.9 WHERE report_id IN (1002, 1003);

UPDATE sales_performance SET revenue = 5000.00 WHERE id = 1;

UPDATE revenue SET total_revenue = 1500.75 WHERE id = 1;

UPDATE ProductDetails SET unit_price = unit_price * 1.1 WHERE category = 'electronics';
